attributes.action: call for a comprehensive inquiry regarding the packaging & recycling industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned call for a comprehensive inquiry regarding the packaging & recycling industry, which results in packaging regulation, centred around, the necessity, creation, types & disposal of packaging, and the review of new types of packaging as they are invented.

•	whether it is acceptable that any product packaging is not recyclable, reusable or safely biodegradable.

•	whether a limitation on packaging materials, sizes, & styles, can contribute to re-use, simplify recycling & reduce the amount of recycling exported.

•	whether the recycling of packaging or its export is an efficient use of materials and energy, in contrast to cleaning and re-use.

•	what bio-degradable solutions are available and commercially scalable.

•	whether industry can withstand packaging & materials regulations under an environmental standard, & what eco-friendly transformations of the packaging industry could be developed, resulting in less land-fill & improved targets on re-use, recycling & CO2 output.
